docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 16 (UP)--Dr. Alberto Gainza Paz, director of La Prensa, seized Buenos Aires newspaper, charged today that the Peron Government was aiming at outright confiscation of the paper.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 16 (UP)--Dr. Alberto Gainza Paz, director of La Prensa, seized Buenos Aires newspaper, charged today that the Peron Government was aiming at outright confiscation of the paper.

headline.main: ACCUSATION ON PRENSA; Paper's Director Sees Peron Aiming at Confiscation

docs.snippet: There is an air of terrific urgency in India's three big port cities these days. As soon as a grain-bearing ship drops anchor in Calcutta, Madras or Bombay, turbaned Indian longshoremen swarm aboard, unload it, sack the grain and speed it onto...
docs.lead_paragraph: There is an air of terrific urgency in India's three big port cities these days. As soon as a grain-bearing ship drops anchor in Calcutta, Madras or Bombay, turbaned Indian longshoremen swarm aboard, unload it, sack the grain and speed it onto freight trains.
docs.abstract: crisis revd; table shows amt sold India by 11 nations

docs.snippet: Capt. Howard F. Lane has taken over command of the Moore-McCormack liner Uruguay from Capt. Albert P. Spaulding, who recently retired after ten years on the bridge of the ship.

docs.snippet: A smart rally in the Canadian dollar late on Friday lifted it to 93.44 cents, erasing all of the midweek loss which had seen it quoted at 93.18 cents, a new low since last October. Activity centered in the markets above the border and values here...
docs.lead_paragraph: A smart rally in the Canadian dollar late on Friday lifted it to 93.44 cents, erasing all of the midweek loss which had seen it quoted at 93.18 cents, a new low since last October. Activity centered in the markets above the border and values here were quickly adjusted to those ruling in the Dominion.
